page.para: Da/li/tso is sad. His toy car is bro/ken.
That night, he has a dream. He can fix his toy car. It’s eas/y.
Now it is fixed. But look! It is grow/ing big/ger and big/ger!
It has be/come a real jeep. It is yel/low and shin/y. He climbs in.
He starts the en/gine. Then he goes. He drives through the vil/lage.
He waves at Mr Ban/da. He waves at Mrs Tem/bo.
He sees his friend Sa/i. He stops to give him a lift.
They go fast/er and fast/er. Peo/ple run out of the way.
But sud/den/ly … oh no! The jeep crash/es in/to a tree.
The crash wakens Da/li/tso. He leaps up.
But now he is hap/py. He knows how to fix his toy car.
